entry.title: Friday night: Showers. Temperature steady near plus 2.
entry.summary: A few showers ending near midnight then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Fog patches developing late this evening. Temperature steady near plus 2. Forecast issued 5:57 PM PST Friday 13 January 2023
